paragraphs.body: Avatar Wiki, as a community site and knowledge resource with members from around the world, has a diverse user base and range of opinions. Users are invited to post their own reviews of each episode of ${link_0}, its ${link_1}, its ${link_2}, and ${link_3}.
paragraphs.text: Avatar Wiki, as a community site and knowledge resource with members from around the world, has a diverse user base and range of opinions. Users are invited to post their own reviews of each episode of Avatar: The Last Airbender, its related comics, its film adaptation, and The Legend of Korra.

paragraphs.body: An overview of the ratings given to each episode and movie is below, with links to each episode page.
